entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'dear' by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: A guest at Harry's party, described as fondly referring to her cake.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who gives him a thumbs-up and mouths 'Good one'.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of the twins who leads the guests into the house.

entities.name: george
entities.description: The other twin who waits at the end of the lane for the guests.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A guest who wears his best and horrible hairy brow suit to honor Harry's occasion.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A guest who smiles as he shakes Harry's hand but looks rather unhappy.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A guest who looks radiant and hugs Harry tightly to wish him a happy birthday.

relationships.description: Harry greets Mrs. Weasley, referring to her cake as 'amazing'.
Ron communicates with Harry by giving him a thumbs-up and mouthing 'Good one'.
Fred leads the guests into the house.
George waits at the end of the lane for the guests.
Hagrid honors Harry's occasion by wearing his best and horrible hairy brow suit.
Lupin shakes hands with Harry, but looks rather unhappy.
Tonks greets Harry by hugging him tightly to wish him a happy birthday.
